response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price. Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth more than what you're willing to pay. However, to make this deal attractive for both of us, I propose a special offer of $140. This price not only reflects the product's true worth but also allows you to enjoy a significant savings compared to the market rate. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and help us reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Looking forward to your positive response!", "product_price": 140}
